Karam has also notably toured [[South America]], [[USA]], [[Australia]] and [[Canada]].http://www.waleg.com/archives/015355.html ==Biography== '''Fares Karam''' was born in [[Jezzine]],in [[Southern Lebanon]] to a modest working-class [[Christian]] family.http://manager.albawaba.com/img/new_sys/mediabank/45228_mb_file_b6624.jpg His father was a farmer and his mother worked as a teacher in the local school for their village. .http://under20.maktoob.com/Article194635-%D8%A7%D9%84%D8%B3%D9%8A%D8%B1%D9%87_%D8%A7%D9%84%D8%B0%D8%A7%D8%AA%D9%8A%D9%87_%D9%84%D9%84%D9%85%D8%B7%D8%B1%D8%A8_%D9%81%D8%A7%D8%B1%D8%B3_%D9%83%D8%B1%D9%85.htm Karam rose to the limelight in the 1990s when he participated in the 1996-7 series of the Lebanese talent show [[Studio El Fan]].
